function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of violence against women due to pandemic responses","Impact":"Reversal of slow but consistent reductions in violence against women","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted policies and programs to support women's safety during the pandemic","Technologies":"Online support services, telemedicine, and digital reporting tools for violence","People":"Women aged 15 to 49 in Peru","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and community organizations"}]}
